section.name: Component Parts
section.p: The Metro runtime provides support for:

ul.li: a component derived declaration of internal structure and access interfaces
container support for the establishment and association of internal parts with a component

section.p: Declaration of the stuctural presumptions of a component is achieved though a Parts interface exposed as a constructor parameter. A Parts interface is recognized using either the default inner class pattern, or via the assertion of part-semanitcs using the parts annotation.
